summary: An epic story of shattered lives of the Don Cossacks through chaos of World War I, the Russian Revolution, and the following Civil War.
cast: Pyotr Glebov|Elina Bystritskaya|Zinaida Kirienko|Daniil Ilchenko|Anastasia Filippova|Nikolai Smirnov|Lyudmila Khityaeva|Natalya Arkhangelskaya|Aleksandr Blagovestov|Igor Dmitriev|Aleksandr Shatov|Boris Novikov|Aleksandr Zhukov|Gennadi Karyakin|Viliam Shatunovsky|Aleksandr Titov|Vadim Zakharchenko|Dmitriy Kapka|Pyotr Chernov|Mikhail Gluzskiy|Viktor Bubnov|Vyacheslav Butenko|Aleksandra Denisova|Aleksandr Grave|Aleksandr Karpov|Valentina Khmara|Pyotr Lyubeshkin|Yelena Maksimova|Olga Markina|Nikolai Muravyov|Vladimir Muravyov|Lyubov Sokolova|M. Stepanov|Semyon Svashenko|Nikolay Tyamin|Mikhail Vasilyev|Inna Vykhodtseva|Sergey Yurtaykin|Vergiliy Renin|Vasiliy Shukshin
title: Quiet Flows the Don
